source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: 3D Modeling for Video Games : Beginners Guide

visible_instructors.job_title: 3D Environment Artist in Video Game Industry
visible_instructors.title: Bradley Wascher
visible_instructors.name: Bradley

items.headline: How to make 3D models for games, film, and VFX inside of Maya!
objectives_summary: How to start using Maya to create 3d models for games, movies, and vfx

items.title: Better Pencil Drawing using the Bargue Drawing Course

visible_instructors.job_title: Artist and Art Instructor: Traditional Drawing & Painting
visible_instructors.title: Juan Martinez
visible_instructors.name: Juan

items.headline: Use the Bargue Drawing Course to acquire skills that can be used in drawing, painting, sculpture, and more.
objectives_summary: Learn the fundamentals of drawing using the time-tested Bargue Drawing Course.
Develop an understanding of what the act of drawing actually is.
Build up the ability to capture a likeness efficiently.

items.title: 3D Animation using Unity Timeline
items.headline: Learn 3D animation like a professional using Unity Timeline with this comprehensive guide
objectives_summary: Animate like a professional
Master the Unity Timeline
Create realistic looking scenes for your animations

items.title: Master Maya - A Guide to 3D Modeling With Maya
items.headline: This course shows you how to quickly get up to speed with one of the most powerful 3D modeling applications - Maya.
objectives_summary: Learn the fundamentals of 3D modelling in Maya

items.title: Create Realistic 3D Hair With Zbrush and Maya (Fibermesh)
items.headline: Learn the basics of creating hair in 3D!
objectives_summary: How to create realistic hair in 3D
The basics of Fibermesh
The basics of Hairsystems

items.title: Character Development In Blender For Beginners
items.headline: Learn the secrets of creating awesome 3D characters for films and games in Blender.
objectives_summary: Create a completely textured and rigged 3D character that is ready to use in production.
Knowledge of 3D cloth modeling and the process of clothing your character.
Generating realistic looking hair and beard.

items.title: Learn to Create 3D Character Art with Cinema 4D

visible_instructors.job_title: Cinema 4D Instructor and Motion Graphic Designer
visible_instructors.title: Al Heck
visible_instructors.name: Al

items.headline: Created in partnership with Maxon: learn to build complex character art in Cinema 4D with this comprehensive guide
objectives_summary: Fully understand how to create optimized UV meshes for your characters
Create character texture art with no visible UV seams
Create flowing polygonal hair for your character

items.title: Learn Toon Boom Harmony Essentials: Simple Turnaround Rigs

visible_instructors.job_title: Video Trainer, Instructor, and Author: Learning Made Simple!
visible_instructors.title: Tony Ross
visible_instructors.name: Tony

items.headline: You Can Learn to Build and Animate Simple Turnaround Rigs in Harmony Essentials
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you'll learn how you can rig and animate your own characters using Toon Boom's entry level software, Harmony Essentials

items.title: Learning Autodesk AutoCAD 3D 2016
items.headline: A Beginners Guide to 3D Computer Aided Design
objectives_summary: Once you have completed this training course, you will be fully capable of creating, editing, rendering, and presenting your own 3D models using AutoCAD 3D

You will start with an introduction to 3D modeling and how to navigate and work in AutoCAD 3D. Then you will  jump into learning how to create 3D models, covering topics such as wireframes, surface modeling, primitive solid models, and creating models from 2D profiles.

items.title: Rigging with Animation Industry´s Techniques
items.headline: Rigging systems used in animation industry in 3Ds Max! *Please send questions to joao.victor.villaca@icloud.com*
objectives_summary: Develop rigging systems for characters

items.title: Introduction to 3D Modeling with OpenSCAD

visible_instructors.job_title: Mathematician, Educator, Pirate of the Caribbean
visible_instructors.title: Sukhada Fadnavis
visible_instructors.name: Sukhada

items.headline: Create amazing 3D models using a free and easy to use software. A quick start course for 3D printing enthusiasts.
objectives_summary: Use OpenSCAD to create printable 3D models
Use geometric transformations to create beautiful and complex 3D shapes
Design personalized 3D printed gifts

items.title: Blackmagic Fusion - From Novice to Expert

visible_instructors.job_title: A+ cert. PC Tech.12+ yrs. exp., 2 Yr. Computer Sci. Degree
visible_instructors.title: Eric Eisenmann
visible_instructors.name: Eric

items.headline: Go beyond the basics in VFX, Compositing, and Motion Graphics with the Free AE alternative Blackmagic Fusion
objectives_summary: Students will gain a good understanding in the tools and functions of the vsisual effects, motion graphics, and digital compositing application Blackmagic Fusion
Students will learn how to create visually compelling motion graphics.
Students will learn how to  add visual effects to their videos.

items.title: Blender 3D - The Ultimate Introduction Course
items.headline: Learn Blender to create fantastic 3D models for video games, 3D printing, house design etc. No prior knowledge required.
objectives_summary: 3D Modeling
Working with Materials
Lighting and Rendering

items.title: How to create a movie in Unreal Engine 5 Beginners Edition
items.headline: Learn how to make a CG Animation in Unreal Engine 5
objectives_summary: How to use Unreal Engine 5's cinematic sequencer to make CG animation
How to create CG animation inside Unreal Engine 5
Installing Unreal Engine 5

items.title: Complete 3D product modeling course Blender 2.8 from A to Z
items.headline: Model , texture , light and render a realistic gaming headset using only blender 2.8
objectives_summary: 3d modeling
basic detail sculpting
texturing

items.title: 3DS MAX 2020 Interior Design Beginners Course
items.headline: Create Stunning Architectural Renders in no Time :)
objectives_summary: Interior Design Modeling, Materials, Lighting and Rendering
How to Create, Texture and Render Interior Design in 3DS MAX 2020 and Arnold Renderer
You'll Be Able to Create Your Own Projects
